group_1.textCenter: (Even though she used to come to Walnut's@every day...)

group_1.textRight: Ma-na-ka!

group_1.textCenter: (Maybe I went too far the other day...)
(She couldn't have gotten tired of my cooking...@Right?)

group_1.textRight: MA-NA-KA!!

group_1.textLeft: Argh!@T-Tsumugi...?!

group_1.textRight: Hey, what's wrong?@You're acting all spaced out!

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, I was just thinking.

group_1.textRight: More importantly, Manaka!@Please give me a bento!

group_1.textLeft: Sure, here you go, it's the last one!
...Come to think of it, that's quite@unusual.
You actually came to buy my bento.

group_1.textRight: I've been curious about Manaka's special bento@for a while.
They're usually sold out after I've finished@eating my mom's lunch.
I ate in a hurry today!
Now then, let's eat!

group_1.textLeft: Wait, you can't eat standing up!@Let's go to a place where we can sit down.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Mmm...your food is great even when it's cold...!

group_1.textLeft: (...You look like you're enjoying it as much@as always...)
(You weren't tired of the taste of my cooking@after all...I'm relieved.)

group_1.textRight: ...Hm? What's wrong, Manaka, is there@something on my face?

group_1.textLeft: ...All over your face.
Rice grains, eggs, ketchup, potato salad...
You've got a little bit of everything@from your lunch!!
Just how did you even manage that?!

group_1.textRight: Hehe, it's been a while since I've had your@cooking, it's so appetizing that I gobbled it up!

group_1.textLeft: (...You really look happy when you eat, @don't you?
(Well... What can I say?)
(It makes me happy seeing you happy@like this...)

group_1.textRight: ...Thanks for the food!@It was delicious!
...Hey, what's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: N-nothing, nothing at all!

group_1.textRight: Haaah...!
If I didn't eat your food today...
I might have dried up...!

group_1.textLeft: ...If that's how you feel, you could@have come after school...

group_1.textRight: I wanted to come too, but...
This was a tough decision!

group_1.textLeft: ...What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Here, look at this!

group_1.textLeft: Umm, that's...
That's the review site you often@post on, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I've been trying really hard@to post a lot of reviews lately.
I'm undergoing warrior training@following the advice of Ria-senpai!
I'm going to call it the@"Tsumugi Level-Up Operation"!

group_1.textLeft: ...Did Ria-senpai fill your head with@something weird...?

group_1.textRight: It's not something weird!
I'll write reviews on various@restaurants to hone my skills.
I'm going to become a famous reviewer!
I'll be so famous that Walnut's will be@fully booked with just one word from me!

group_1.textLeft: ...No way, wouldn't that be extremely difficult...?

group_1.textRight: I can do it if I work hard!
I've gotten better at writing reviews lately, too!
Look! I'm getting lots of followers!

group_1.textLeft: ...It's true.

group_1.textRight: I'll keep up the good work and become useful.
Manaka, wait for me!

group_1.textCenter: I can't let a delicious restaurant go@out of business...no way!
